lines.italian_mirror: metti il peso del capo sotto la forza delle molle
lines.english: place the weight of the head beneath the force of the springs
lines.notes: Line adjacent to torsion spring sketch; ambiguous preposition resolved via context.

lines.italian_mirror: le cinghie delle spalle si uniscano al petto per reggere il contrappeso
lines.english: the shoulder straps join at the chest to bear the counterweight
lines.notes: Suggests torso harness geometry; informs structural constraints.

lines.italian_mirror: quando il piede spinge la leva, l'ala si solleva con moto pari
lines.english: when the foot drives the lever, the wing rises with equal motion
lines.notes: Supports assumption of symmetric flapping linkage.
